TABLE.NAME: opencast
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the opencast activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.

FIELD.NAME: uploadjobid
FIELD.COMMENT: The uploadjob id to refer to after upload

FIELD.NAME: uploadoptionsjson
FIELD.COMMENT: This field stores upload options in json string, like title, visibility, etc. which is required by inline editable fields.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of instance. See opencasttype
